channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tea Tariffs Once Sparked a Revolution. Now They Are Creating Angst
item.description: Small businesses that serve and sell tea are feeling the squeeze from tariffs.

item.title: Your Brain Has a Productivity Style. Here’s How to Find It
item.description: Like a good jazz ensemble, everyone on your team has different styles that can be harmonized.

item.title: Eli Lilly to Launch a GLP-1 Pill to Rival Ozempic, but There’s a Catch
item.description: The new drug will target weight loss for people with obesity and type 2 diabetes.

item.title: Black Friday Puts Focus on Consumer Spending for Rocky Markets
